channel.title: Cameron Crites' sports blog
channel.description: Recent content on Cameron Crites' sports blog

item.title: Why Nikola Jokic should win NBA MVP
item.description: When watching the NBA, there are multiple players that many fans go out of their way to watch on a nightly basis. Lebron James is arguably the greatest to ever play, Stephen Curry changed the game with his shooting ability, and Giannis Antetokounmpo looks to become the next face of the NBA after winning his first championship last season. But any invested NBA fan will tell you there is another player that continues to change the way people look at the game.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my website! My name is Cameron Crites, and I am a sophomore at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln, majoring in Sports Media/Communication and Advertising/Public Relations. On this site, you will find a collection of the pieces of work that I have put together, and I hope that you will find them interesting. Enjoy, and thanks for stopping by!
